name: bernard/bernard
description: Message queue implemented in PHP with Redis as a backend.

suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Allow sending messages to an AMQP server using php-amqplib
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Allow sending messages to simulated message queue in a database via doctrine dbal
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Allow sending messages to Beanstalk using pheanstalk
suggest.predis/predis: Allow sending messages to Redis using predis
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Allow sending messages to AWS services like Simple Queue Service
suggest.mongodb/mongodb: Allow sending messages to a MongoDB server via PHP Driver
